ChangeNote: Fix a problem for compliance rules that caused incorrect calculation of in benchmark operator when it was used in the within part
The error when saving performance measurement with a deleted reporting structure node has been fixed.
Add processing time field to Interface Options
Fix non-existing rowid error.
Flaky test ignored

When the credit impaired interest was calculated on the tax lots, the values were rounded separately for each tax lot, causing the rounding difference on the aggregation to the P/L level. Now the rounding is made after the aggregation with the following re-distribution to the P/L match level, providing more accurate result.
Logic for copying Reference 2 value to second leg was introduced
Logic for new codes introduced accordingly
Fixing Api tests that failed in RVP. Nothing that makes sense for customers.

Changing the logic regarding the Interest Appreciation Basis 'Coupon(orig)' for instruments having fixing frequency higher than the coupon payment frequency. Now the future coupon cash flow is based on the fixing rate on the tax lot effective date, rather than on the coupon rate on that date.
Allowed hostnames up to 200 characters in UI for configurations for IAP Direct Communication Service, and corrected error in same service where it couldn't filter on GroupCode groupings.
Fix problem with hanging application on closing
Flaky test ignored
Active endpoints are listed in MapApiRoleToEndpoints window
Re-running the conversion program convTmStaticDataOnly after upgrade could cause data corruption causing Trade Manager Contract Terms Contracts not to load. This was fixed.
Authentication credentials replaced to ensure ASB test is correctly executed.
For CA transactions involving nominal-unit-lot instruments, six-digit rounding is used unless a more stringent rounding requirement is defined
Stabilized flaky unit test

When you use the GetStatus endpoint of the OTC Web Batch Api and ask for a status with a Prefer header that says to wait for a certain number of seconds, if the batch you asked about isn't done yet, you'll get the response as soon as it's finished or when the waiting time runs out.
Fix visual grid issues
Before using scdBatchQueue.exe to queue batch job groups the user and the machine it was queued from were stored on the batch queue, scdBatchQueue.exe are now doing the same
It wasn't possible to update Trade Manager Items and Fields (AUTTRADEMGRITEMS) setups using Xpress instrument types. This has been corrected.
Update the Reinvestment Service version to properly encode symbols in the URL.
Cleanup of large portfolio calculation data via the Data cleanup service is now logged in the Cleanup log.

This change fixes the Margin Pay amount in the “Collateral Initial Margin Payments” window when adjusting existing Initial Margin Payment transactions. Previously, modifying a transaction could show an incorrect Margin Pay amount compared to the previous transaction, especially when switching between increasing and decreasing the Initial Margin requirement. Now the Margin Pay field always shows the correct positive amount of delta in the Initial Margin requirement.
increase InitialFetchSize

In the 'Trade Repository Pool' 'Nominal balance after trade' was wrongly determined as 0, in case 'Opening Sequence number' was not defined a 'Accounting split field' in the relevant FAP. This has been fixed.

Added new parameter "Bypass Swift approval"  to the Batch job "Netting manager - Load- Send".  With this parameter set to "Yes" - Netting Swift messages will be sent even if they were not approved yet.
Parametric VaR and Monte Carlo VaR were calculated incorrectly for pricing methods "quoted value" and 'Quoted value, position.' It has been corrected.

An Alternative Investment Sell (AltInvSell) transaction is now respected in the position calculation, especially if the full position is sold.

GL transactions export- in case no portfolio and portfolio group are shown for unauthorised user, no any portfolio condition was applied to find finance transactios. In this way the user was able to compress the finance transactions that he is not supposed to see. This has been fixed
The portfolio calculation workflow has been updated. As part of this update, the TRANSINCMATCH processing step will be skipped in scenarios where income matching is not applicable.
CustomerApplyNote: The portfolio calculation workflow has been updated. As part of this update, the TRANSINCMATCH processing step will be skipped in scenarios where income matching is not applicable.

In Deal Capture for ‘Cash Buckets – Move Cash’ the system automatically finds the Account if the Model Portfolio and Currency returned one unique account. This has been enhanced to include the Portfolio as well, meaning if the Model Portfolio and Currency don’t return a unique account, the system will use Portfolio as well to see if this returns a single account.

Right now Modified spread duration, Modified duration YC and Modified duration YTM are not being calculated for extended position type and Bond Instrument. This PR fix that and add support for these fields to extended bond instruments.
Optimized the way that AM Cache stores data in Oracle. The new format will be used for new data sets.  It takes up less storage and is faster to write and load
Implement UPT request tracing for gRPC in .NET Framework

When the warnings are present and not ignored during saving OTC transactions from Trade Manager and the user is asked to continue, the  booking engine was run before the prompt message is displayed. This affected the performance and now is improved: the run of the booking engine is excluded before the warning is accepted by a user.

Make sure that the calculation period selected in the Reinvestment batch jobs matches the frequency chosen for it. That will help to avoid Calculation errors related to the incorrect date range during the job execution. Add the Frequency parameter to the Reinvestment batch job log to increase transparency.

The Adjustment group field is read only unless a Corporate action event has been chosen. A validation has been added to ensure that all adjustments in an adjustment group have the same date and the same corporate action event.

To reduce the time "wasted" in the STP chain, the STP services will now wake each other when there are some thing to do. E.g. The receiver service will wake the transaction service when it has inserted data into the internal queue, and the transaction service will wake the status service when it has created transactions.
This is an internal change. The change has no customer impact.
Cosmetic change on popup for Gen. Report functionality

The two parameters 'Minimum polling interval' and 'Disable minimum polling interval' on 'Show System Configuration / STP' has been deleted, as they are obsolete.
In rare cases a crash occurred in  Asset Manager on writing trace information.  This has now been corrected.

The conversion program that deletes the old mucs files were first executed when upgrading to 26.04 instead of 26.01. This has been fixed.
In Dynamic Tolerances screen, on executing action File / Copy, 'Latest recalculation' group of fields is being cleared now.
Added new contract in Messaging Framework and adjusted code in IMS

The composition of the inflation curve when "Include CPI values" = true has been corrected such that the lag defined on the RPI on the contract is correctly taken into account when "Decompose XpressInstruments" is used.
Create Orders Pre-Trade API endpoint has been extended to support the "RequestedStatus" field with 'Entry' or 'Pre-check' statuses.

The 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job produces data files with decomposed fund components for the Investment Analytics Platform. The result set includes a position that represents the residual from the decomposition. Residual components do not have a security and all security derived dimensions should therefore be undefined for the residual position, meaning that the internal dimension value key (IK) should be zero and the external dimension value ID should be 'Undefined'. When using the hard coded list of dimensions, i.e. when not using attribute configuration, the external ID was set to an empty string (null) for the instrument type dimension on the residual position. This produces a validation error when the files are processed by Investment Analytics Platform. The 'Performance Calculation -  Upload Results' batch job has exactly the same error when 'Upload decomp. funds' is selected in the related data source definitions.

The error has been corrected so the external ID is set to 'Undefined' when the instrument type dimension value is undefined.
Added new fields to order table
UI changes to be able to change the document type of a capital notice in Document Processing - Alternatives

When doing database trace on a connection to another tablespace than the SimCorp Dimension tablespace then it was tried to save the name of the trace file a SimCorp Dimension table. This fails due to that the connection does not have access to the table. This has been fixed.
Refactor the functionality for translating security indentifier type and value into internal key to a seperate project so it can be re-used in many cases
Settlement defaults were not applied for the Exercise CDS index option transaction. The error has been fixed.
Automation profile field added to the Collateral Pools Base filter
Technical: fiCHILDREN were not cleaned up when sub-forms were closed in headless mode

This regards the generation of Total Return Swap Adjustment transactions for basket TRS with multiple planned adjustments on the same date. We must include all the previously evaluated in-memory adjustment transactions in the holding data evaluation for the relevant constituents in the group being processed. We also allow the generation of all the transactions that can be generated up to any eventual basket order that cannot be processed.
Introduce a retry mechanism for dead-locks when updating static data
The PFCEXECSAPPENDLOG table was not ignored in the delete check. The error has been corrected.
Fixed LinkedTransactions API crash
Flaky test ignored
Only use one common InputFieldDefinitionManagerVolatile . Change wait time to 5 seconds.
Fix clearing of allocation data on update vis Mass update

Internal update. No functioanlity changed.  truLoanFacilCntGetExistTrans changed to also take  list of depkeys as argument, so functions needing only subset, does not need to filter them out later. Should help a little with performance.
Send messages to Oracle Queue only after the commit is done.
For Trade Manager CDS Index Options, on Open transactions, add support for expiring on an IMM date within a given interval
In Extra Search Condition Fields, it is now possible to add 'Department'.

When calculating a 'Volatility Curve' Definition having 'SABR Shift' checked in very rare cases a database error could occur. This has been fixed.
Make the captions of the transaction codes for the old and new functionality for the CDS Option instrument type more distinct.

Execute the Reinvestment Rules one by one to prevent a deadlock in database.

There was no possibility to define path for the Asset Manager Online logging trace files. Now the path can be defined on Front Office tab of Support Tool Options form with default local temp directory (as before) when the path is not specified.
3T/Technical: improve tests
Enable tracing of calls to OneLib for CDS pricing

The system will now prevent the user from saving segments referring records which have been deleted. 
E.g. saving a segment with a condition ala Currency In 'DKK;EUR;<UNKNOWN>' will be stopped. 

The situation with <unknown> values happens if creating a segment, and then afterwards deleting one of the values the segment reference. When loading the segment afterwards the deleted values will be shown as <unknown>

The 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job provides decomposition data for the Investment Analytics Platform (IAP). This is used to calculate market values and cash flows in both RC and LC on decomposed fund components. The calculation in LC is currently done based on component returns in LC and weights in RC. This is incorrect and the resulting market values and cash flows does not produce the correct return in LC.

The LC calculation should be done using weights in LC instead of RC. This correction enhances the 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job, so it produces a daily file with weights in LC.
Disable autocomplete feature if field is not an item field
Add per-leg currency and nominal to FO holdings.
For Departments, the maximum length of 'Department' has been changed from 10 to 16., and the maximum length of 'Department name' has been changed from 30 to 50.
Do not send repeatedly the same wof.-file from WM Owner to consumer

Instrument names in the OTC Web Api for single contract and for batch of contracts are different (E.g. ‘IRSwapFixedFloat’ in OTC Web Api instead of ‘FixedFloat’). This was fixed. Now names are the same
add logic for requests with curves and dials
Improved performance of Grid control in Scd Web
To improve the performance of the WM interface, a new database index WMPOOL(ISIN,CHGTS) has been created.
In the Trade Manager it was possible to update the FX rate of done adjustments already attached to a transaction, creating data inconsistencies. This is  no longer possible

added ability to exclude and include fields for comparison simultaneously
Fix memory leak
For Trade Manager CDS Index Options, on Open transactions, add support for expiring on an IMM date within a given interval
skeleton for SCD Web copilot
Introduce sample APIs in internal testing API family
The code that builds up the initial transaction matrix for STP should not turn the initial nulls to zeros for fields in listsFundIncCompFldsAll.

Update to the code that checks the effect of the current TRS basket adjustment transaction on the holding’s balance nominal in the generation phase before saving when multiple planned adjustments exist on the same date. Earlier unsaved in-memory generated adjustment transactions must be taken into account.

A Compliance-Manager-related issue with multi-legged instruments has been fixed. It occurred when rules with different accounting views were validated together. In that case, the system failed to find all legs of a holding and returned a data exception for attributes like "Currency opposite leg" or "Nominal absolute legged".

For Trade Manager CDS Index Options, make price method field optional

Fixed a problem where Trade Manager trades could be saved incorrectly if a suitable market observable for the underlying didn't exist yet.

The flag indicating whether an Exercise CDS index option transaction is being modified or not was not set correctly. The error has been fixed.

For an Exercise CDS Index Option in the Trade Manager, spot price and correction current value QC/PC are calculated for the option elementary transaction. These values should also be present on the corresponding underlying CDS elementary transaction. This has now been fixed.

Initial changes were made in the Trade Manager to support TRS Rollover.

Enable orders for Hybrid instrument FX Option

When copying a TRS basket contract in the Trade Manager, the Price QC disappeared from the initial basket grid. This was fixed.

In the Trade Manager it was possible to update the FX rate of done adjustments already attached to a transaction, creating data inconsistencies. This is  no longer possible

TVPI calculations did not work without PICC benchmark-data. A fallback PICC estimation using contribution rates from the relevant forecast model has been introduced. The approach is the same as what is used when we calculate distribution rates.

The fallback is used bot when calculating TVPI values with the alternative investment manager forecasts functional but will also impact the right click 'Show Benchmark Data for TVPI' in the 'Fund model' window.
This change is not visible to the user. Irregular notional data is no longer maintained for Total Return Swap static data.
Capture trade not working for classic orders. Fixed

Add new parameter "Transactions in netting group"  to the Batch job "Net and Export".  With this parameter set  -  groups that have transaction count more then specified number will be ignored

Added new parameter "Transactions in netting group" for the "Netting Manager - Load - Send" batch job type - it allows sending only the netting groups that contain less or equal amount of transactions (empty parameter = no filtering).

Collateral Communication Service: Incoming Clearing Broker Statements from the Azure Service Bus that cannot be processed due to invalid message formats or internal service errors are now moved to the Dead Letter Queue. Properly imported messages are acknowledged.

The 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job produces fund decomposition data for the Investment Analytics Platform. The solution was flawed in the scenario where a component moves out of the fund, e.g. in case of a sell transaction. In this case, the market value SOD and cash flow SOD values that corresponds to the "moves out" would appear on the residual instead of on the component itself.

The problem has been solved by enhancing the 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job, so it produces a data record for the component on the day it moves out. The record has SOD and EOD weights equal to zero to dictate that the component moves out. With this additional data record, the market value SOD and cash flow SOD values appear on the component itself, thus resulting in a better decomposition.

Please note that existing data in the Investment Analytics Platform will not be impacted by this correction. A new 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' is needed for this correction to impact the results in the Investment Analytics Platform.

It is client specific code to introduce a check to ensure that when the MDV event is seen to be ready, it truly does not have any un-validated unfinished MDV events linked to the fund. When there are un-validated unfinished MDV events, then STP process allows rules that fail but have an error level of warning to skip the check and allow the validation to continue. The portfolio calculation did not include a bank account position having a zero balance on the first calculation date, but a non-zero balance on the last calculation date. The problem was that a cost/tax payment in the bank account had a cost payment date prior to its transaction agreement date; while the last portfolio calculation date was later than the cost payment date, but prior to the transaction agreement date. The zero-position check in the portfolio calculation did not find such payments. The error has been corrected for both bank accounts and cash buckets.

Special ex/cum functionality can be disabled from a specific end-date in Transaction Options.
When disabled, but Dividends was created before the end-date, the dividend payment date was used instead of the ex date for calculating the nominal basis.
This was not correct as before it was disabled it was the ex date that was used for calculating the nominal basis.

The problem has been solved by using the ex date also when the functionality is disabled, but dividends are generated before the end-date.

Refactoring the Deviation calculator in General reconciliation.  No changes to functionality.  Rewritten: helper class, classes in separate files, methods inside corresponding classes, builder pattern, strategy pattern for calculation
Added 'BatchJobId' and  'RiskFactorScenarioIds' tags to the control file
Increased length for the Axioma stress test field (40->60)
Fix problem when data dissapears from editor when user resize column
This finalize the new portfolio upload batch job
3T: Disable 'close' ('x') button in the log windows handled automatically.
Refactoring transaction generation numbers
Deprecation of okayToDelete tag usage
Trade Manager: add localization support for a data import error message
Update Vanguard transaction streaming model with new fields
The composition of the inflation curve when "Include CPI values" = true has been corrected such that the lag defined on the RPI on the contract is correctly taken into account.
Fix text color of focused sub menu items
Remove a configuration flag that was no longer used
Empty portal schema should be threated as an error
An internal test for ASTRA cashflow forecasting has been added.
Flaky test ignored
Put requests are now available for simulations in the OTC Web Api
Fix column jumping in selected fields panel
Trade Manager: Refactoring
The "Multi Manual Finance Transaction" form now has an extra validation preventing saving, when the decimals on the amounts does not correspond to the digits on the corresponding currency.
Increase Dependency field size in DWH Load Plan window to allow save more dependencies
Enable open-ended repo orders
Tests would fail locally if an initialization function was not run, ensure the initialization function is always run in these cases
Fixed session exception handling
Add fund evaluation into SFDR Eligibility analytics: 3.17.1 and 3.17.2 and 1.16.1 and 1.16.2
CustomerApplyNote: Eligibility FlexAnalytics 3.17.1 and 3.17.2 and 1.16.1 and 1.16.2 needs to be updated

ChangeNote: In Fund definitions; copying a fund certificate should not create a new entry on class fund. This issue has now been fixed.

The ASPCIK is still referenced in the INSERT and UPDATE triggers on the USERS that changes the corresponding record in AUTPROFILES

References and use of ASPCIK is removed from the triggers
A database error occurred when executing the batch task  'Performance Calculation - Upload Results'. this has been corrected.
Add missing metrics to track in Application Insights
Added simulation macro to SST applet
Implemented missing condition for standalone portfolio
Elementary transaction components with message status ‘Rescheduled’ or ‘Error’ can safely be set 'On Hold' and should not be categorized as invalid.
Flaky test ignored
Collateral Automation service will process an automation request for a new/updated Collateral Initial Margin Payment transaction to proceed automatically booking Tri-Party Instruction.
A previously selected list value will now always be visible on an existing list, even if it is currently hidden or no longer of the same type.
3t changes
Flaky test required a fix

It is not possible to turn on extra logging only for FOD services (logging of processing queue) without turning on logging  from all stations (logging of enqueueing). This is very inconvenient in production environment on client side, because we are not sure all stations have access to log folder.
Fixed. Now it is possible to log only FOD servers. In worst case (in case there is no access to log folder for some reason), only FOD services will fail which is much less dangerous.
Handle race condition when closing sessions in AzureLoadTest
Update for internal test brick fwk
Transactions RVP refactoring
Improve message formatting for the Reinvestment Batch Job when not all required services are started.
Improved synchronization with C# application availability.
Changing chunk size so that db trace files are read faster from the database
Internal change that should not affect customers.
The STP receiver filter now support table 'Transactions - Free Codes' (TRANSFREECODES) and columns from this.
Internal code change. No user visible changes
This is an internal change. This will not affect client functionality.
Add a standard attribute 'Initial Investment Strategy' in Attribute Configuration.
Xpress instrument IMW table primary key name corrected
Redraw results monitor applet ribbon to have a better look and UX
This is an internal SimCorp change. No Customers are affected
Actions that are executed from the application menu will be handled, taking into account the context
Support credentials or integrated authentication for connections
Added new helper function 'FormatAsLfDateString' in 'Utilities.Core'.
Added support for pool underlying repo orders
Round FX rate, balance and nominal to decimals defined in corresponded fields
In  "External Values", running in SCD Web (3T), not all expected columns were shown
Option specific div yield - validate that date is before latest fixing date
Make it faster to list values in List Calculation in the PFC.
It is now possible to use the edit multiple records functionality in the parties window.
Internal change, not relevant for release
This is an improvement for internal tool that supports funds' G/L transactions with no impact on business functionality.
Implement translations for FUNDFIGVIEW and PORTFIGVIEW config types
Fixed redemption payment date for callable bonds if call/put option is applied and option date falls on a holiday.
Making a HealthCheck/Status endpoint for the Instruments Web API
A workspace full could occur when loading data. This has been corrected. Now the system will load the first x records, and warn more is present.
Session might crash with due to WS FULL by getting initial conditions to calculate issue yield time series
getassetX functions are now enabled in security group code formulas
Enable look aside load balancing for flexible analytics service.
After UP source code move some assemblies are missing from bundle
In some situations, Oracle chose a wrong execution plan leading to a very bad performance for the ‘Initialising – Building keys...’ step. This has been corrected.
Matured securities are excluded from the FIPA Effect Calculation.
Flaky test ignored
Crashes happens sometimes when AM tries to fetch big number of holdings in historical mode. Fixed. Now we issue an error instead.
The sub tab "Change Portfolio Booking Date" on the "Portfolio" -> "Extra Information" -> "Info" is now hidden. No change in user functionality.
"Open folder" button on the Order Outbox ribbon had no image with Large resolution. This has now been corrected.
